equivalent: 1 - bam, blow, chop, clobber, clout, crash, crunch, hit, impact, kick, knock, pelt, pound, punch, slam, slug, smash, strike, thud, thunk, wham
2 - catch, clutch, glom, grab, grasp, hold, nab, seize, snag, snatch
comments: 1 - the sound of an impact during a fight
2 - seizing something with a sudden motion or grasp
